properties.areaDesc: Point Isabelle to Lower Entrance of Portage Canal MI; Huron Islands to Marquette MI; Manitou Island to Point Isabelle MI; Portage Lake to Huron Island MI to Lower Entrance of Portage Canal To Huron Islands MI Including Keweenaw and Huron Bays
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 2 at 10:57AM EST until January 3 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...Manitou Island to Point Isabelle MI, Point Isabelle to
Lower Entrance of Portage Canal MI, Lower Entrance of Portage
Canal To Huron Islands MI Including Keweenaw and Huron Bays
and Huron Islands to Marquette MI.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY
